entry.title: Ripple And Archax Deepen Partnership To Tokenize RWAs Worth Millions On XRPL
entry.summary:
Ripple, known for its enterprise blockchain solutions, and Archax, the UK‚Äôs first Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) regulated digital asset exchange, broker, and custodian, have announced a significant extension to their partnership. This extension aims to tokenize hundreds of millions of dollars of real world assets (RWAs) using the XRP Ledger (XRPL), positioning XRPL as a frontrunner in the realm of blockchain-based RWA tokenization.
Ripple Eyes RWA Tokenization Market
This latest announcement expands on a relationship that began in 2022, when Archax first collaborated with Metaco, subsequently acquired by Ripple in mid-2023, to offer enhanced digital asset custody services. This existing relationship set the stage for a deeper collaboration focusing on leveraging XRPL for RWA tokeni‚Ä¶

entry.title: Solana Founder Reveals SOL Surpasses Ethereum In This Major Metric
entry.summary:
Solana founder, Anatoly Yakovenko has declared that SOL has surpassed Ethereum, the world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency in a critical metric ‚Äì the economic barrier for honest nodes to participate in consensus.¬†
Solana Outpaces Ethereum By 10X In This Metric
According to Yakovenko, the economic barrier for honest nodes to participate in consensus in Solana is 10 times higher than Ethereum‚Äôs at the moment. Typically, blockchains like Ethereum and Solana rely on a distributed network of computers, also known as nodes, to validate and record transactions. This entire process is called a consensus and ensures that all nodes in the network work together to maintain the blockchain‚Äôs performance and security.¬†
However, Yakovenko suggests that not all nodes are equal and participation in ‚Ä¶

entry.title: Stablecoin Giant Paxos Shocks With 20% Workforce Slash
entry.summary:
Paxos, a key player in the cryptocurrency industry, has caused a stir with an unexpected move. The company recently laid off approximately 20% of its staff, roughly 65 employees. This decision, however, appears to be part of a calculated gamble rather than a sign of financial distress.
According to a report by PYMNTS, Paxos CEO Charles Cascarilla framed the layoffs as a strategic shift to ‚Äúbest execute on the massive opportunity ahead in tokenization and stablecoins.‚Äù
Paxos: Cashing In On ‚ÄòSafer Yield‚Äô
Intriguingly, Cascarilla emphasized the company‚Äôs focus on regulated, yield-bearing stablecoins as a key driver behind the layoffs. Stablecoins are cryptocurrencies pegged to a real-world asset, typically the US dollar, designed to offer price stability.
However, some indus‚Ä¶

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 124 - THE ETH ETF IS APPROVED!
entry.summary: ETH ETFs get approved 19b-4 forms. ETFs won‚Äôt trade until July or August: Galaxy. ETF means many coins not securities: Coinbase CLO. Coinbase relists XRP in US. SOL ETF coming: Scaramucci. US House passes vote to ban CBDC. Building a pro-crypto army in congress: Sen. Lummis. Polymarket backlash over if ETH ETF truly approved. Expect ETH ETFs to be 10-15% of BTC: Bloomberg. BTC ETFs see $1.75bn inflows over 9 days. BTC to $150k in 2024 is base case: Tom Lee. ETH co-founder moves $37m ETH to exchanges. Grayscale launches trusts for STX & NEAR. Coinbase loses against SEC on DOGE sweepstakes. ALGO ad attacks BTC, SOL, ETH. Phantom now no.2 finance App on Google Play.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 123 - ETHEREUM KEEPS GOING!
entry.summary: ETH soars, ETF S1 approvals expected in hours. US house greenlights FIT21 bill with broad support. Gensler says SEC already has rules for crypto. Hong Kong set to allow ETH staking for ETFs. ETH OI continues to soar. SOL mentioned as next ETF candidate on CNBC. SOL ETF will take years: Bloomberg. MetaMask plans BTC integration. Fed says only 7% of Americans own crypto. SBF heads to a new prison. Hong Kong orders WLD shutdown. TON added to Binance ahead of potential listing.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 122 - ETH ETF MOVES CLOSER!
entry.summary: ETH ETFs move closer to approval, drop staking. Blackrock ETF see biggest inflow in 6 weeks. Grayscale ETH discount narrows under 10%. BTC & ETH heading for ATH: StanChart. Banana zone squared coming for ETH: Raoul Pal. Trump accepts crypto donations including DOGE. Pelosi mulls support of crypto bill. Farcaster raises $150M, DEGEN up 20%. Coinbase to launch gold & oil futures trading. Uniswap ‚Äòready to fight‚Äô against SEC. Vitalik proposes solutions to MEV problems. Phantom may soon support email sign-up. Jupiter announces initiative to tokenise RWAs.
